Articles.Content: I’m playing on console and if my spaceship has more than one kerbal onboard I can’t get out of the cockpit view if I click Iva is there any way to fix this

Hello,

I think you must click "C" key. You can look for "kerbal key bindings" in Google to have all the shortcut keys.

Here's a link to the XBox control scheme.  I didn't see a 'toggle IVA' button (which is what 'C' does on PC) but you can try playing with going to Map Mode and back or switching cameras.

Here's a link to the PS4 control scheme.  It's the same story--no obvious 'C' analogue--but you can still try the tricks I mentioned before.
